website_summaries.verdict: You probably won't want to wear it into thick forest, but for other uses, it blends in well and adjusts to fit all sizes.
pros: Comes in your choice of Mixed Style or Woodland Forest
Easy to put on and take off
Elastic bands adjust to fit all sizes
cons: Camouflage string coverage is a little lacking, a problem that grows due to the suit's tendency to shed whenever you brush up against trees, bushes, or other objects

customer_reviews.title: A few improvements needed, but good product!
customer_reviews.text: This could easily be a 5☆ product, if the jacket snaps would be stronger/holding tighter when moving around - and the camo-strings attached better! You'll leave a trail of strings! Otherwise great! These two things improved and it would be definitely up there in the 5☆ range - so, only a few improvements needed! Look/camo feature is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASTON MARTIN Expert

customer_reviews.title: ... honestly say you will NEVER find a deal as good as this
customer_reviews.text: Having served in the USMC and used the suits I can honestly say you will NEVER find a deal as good as this. Could have a bit heaver pattern for the hood but I still love this thing. It breaths very well comparatively
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Love the costume, hate the clean up!
customer_reviews.text: My kid has been wearing this every year for 3 years now. He loves scaring trick or treaters on halloween. Only issue is it sheds so much and how would you even clean it? There is a trail of costume everywhere he goes and leaves and stuff get stuck to it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauntel Frazier

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as advertised. I purchased the woodland/forest design. We tested it out at dusk, mid-day, and dawn and it did not disappoint. The quality is great, it's not heavy, it's breathable and easy to put on and take off. I am 6"3 and 200 pounds, and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: works great and you can hide just a few feet from ...
customer_reviews.text: works great and you can hide just a few feet from anything and anyone. the down side is that it gets caught up in "everything". if you are in a brushy area you will go home with additional weight including pine cones (many of them). you can get brush twigs caught between the legs and they will join the legs together. as far as the camo part it works great, so choose sit or stalk, but you can't stalk with this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm 6'3" 300lbs, and this thing fits fairly well. The pants for perfectly, but the jacket has trouble staying snapped because of my gut pushing the snaps open. For the price, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun as a costume. Not sure about out in the wild...
customer_reviews.text: I don't hunt. I got this suit as a Halloween costume, and scared everyone at work. They couldn't tell it was me, so that was fun. The suit seems sturdy enough for walking around, but I don't know how it would do in the woods, in contact with foliage and branches. Some of the twine did unravel even with no major environmental contact. Also, the suit is hot! So unless it's cool outside where you'll be wearing it, expect to not wear it long.
customer_reviews.author: A. ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: Fits Tall Guy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, I am 6'6'' and it fits me in every way. That is a big deal, it is hard to find the things you want in a size you need when your this tall.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Its Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for paintball and it works great. Cons are the strings does somtimes fall off little by little and twigs, sticks, and thorns tend to get stuck on the suit. Benifits were i blended in with the woods and the shrubs, i got tons of compliments, pictures taken with random strangers, and fear factor rose drastically when i wore it. Also saves paintballs due to the fact that i was able to get closer to people and make them surrender with out them seeing me get close to them. I loved it, totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: The fitment is good, mobility was the main concern and that wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The fitment is good, mobility was the main concern and that wasn't an issue. The suit pieces come rolled up from the inside out, be careful when righting the pieces. The color is good, quality it ok for the price. It's essentially a mesh camo netting with Moss like yarns. Be careful with snagging things, the material will pull away from the suit. Overall I'm happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Our son absolutely loved this costume and used it many times for Halloween ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son absolutely loved this costume and used it many times for Halloween and on other occasions. The costume is very effective camouflage. We had to stop him scaring all the neighbors -- he would crouch down and look like a bush, then stand up as they walked by. He's had it for a couple years and it's still in great condition despite running around the neighborhood in it.
customer_reviews.author: sfmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids loves it. Mom thinks it is stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so my kid loves this...but I'll tell ya...it stinks after a very short period of time. I'm sure it's the material but you can't really wash it very well. I have because I couldn't stand it and hung it to dry but then I had to spend time unraveling the yarn. I am still giving it a five star review because the entire point is that my kid LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: then I highly recommend this suit
customer_reviews.text: This ghillie suit is well made, even when shaking out the strands they to do not fall out. The blend of colors blends into the brush/woods no matter what time of the year Jacket, pants, head cover, and rifle cover all blend together perfectly. If you want to get in the woods and not be seen, then I highly recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong I love wearing it to scare people for Halloween but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review for this so it's aware of the condition of only two wears. I have noticed the strings/material it's made out of tends to come off when trying to untangle it, and I have done nothing harsh with it just yet but I have worn it two times and I have a hole in the right side of the pants (where my pocket of my pants underneath is at). Don't get me wrong I love wearing it to scare people for Halloween but I have not had it for a month yet and it's falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it was really good. Not sure how it would be for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Halloween, and it was really good. Not sure how it would be for hunting....or for a sniper. Very lightweight, which was actually good. Didn't get heated in it. Materials and the camouflage are okay, but not what a "professional" would use. But for the cheap price, it was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price but lacking in material on the shoulders
customer_reviews.text: This suit is pretty well made but I found that the shoulders were lacking in thread material leaving the shoulders exposed (see picture). Instead of returning the suit, I used the gun Camo peice as a extra layer and sewed it onto the suit between the top two layers of thread. After a half hour of sewing, it looks perfect and the suit finally has the look I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for paintball. It works great for that purpose! It also doubles as a great Halloween costume. Fit was perfect for me (I'm 6'4", 200 lbs and gangly). Quality is good and overall I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very good, no issues
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year old son loves it! I thought it would be way too big but evidently oversize is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Buxton

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no hunting expert. I don't even hunt. But, my husband wanted a ghillie suit. I wanted to get him one for Christmas so I searched locally. I found them, but the prices were rediculous! I decided to check Amazon. Glad I did! I found this suit. It was reasonably priced and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: HappyToBeMe

customer_reviews.title: This is as good as you would expect at the given price
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to any negative reviews. This is as good as you would expect at the given price. I'm 6ft 190 lbs. Fits great and seems durable enough. Had a few people stare at me crazy wearing this in the front yard. I like the product. I'm glad I ignored the negativity in some reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Over all I would say Im satisfied Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Being that the ghillie is made of yarn as opposed to jute or burlap it gets caught on alot of stuff but it can't be beat for the price. Over all I would say Im satisfied Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ghillie Suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review after countless Amazon purchases. The suit fits well and looks excellent! I'm 5' 4" about 140 lbs and it looks great. I was a little worried it would be too big at first, but it worked out very well (I bought the adult size). This is going to be a great addition for our haunted house and I can use it for airsoft. Don't waste your money on the much more expensive suits online, this one will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin P. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Fits great with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son wanted for Halloween costume. Fits great with room to grow...very comfortable to wear. Happy with the third piece(head piece not connected and the stuff bag!
customer_reviews.author: Running Free

customer_reviews.title: Halloween for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son last Halloween, OK it is a bit much but that is what he wanted and believe me he has warn it several times airsoft hunting as well and it is holding up very good for a 11 year old (kids are not easy on things). The unit looks great and fit good on him, it is long enough it would fit me as well, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for my haunted attraction. I tell you, I've been to Army surplus stores and gun shows, you can't beat the price. It shipped FAST. AS in, it was there the next day. If you've never worn a Ghilly suit, please note you're going to pick up every stray leaf, vine and stick in the area. Which is awesome for blending in, sucky if your legs are vined together and you're in a hurry to chase someone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Vallas

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Halloween is the perfect time for this. Love scaring the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: John McMunn

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my brother because he is a crazy ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother because he is a crazy man and he loves it. Still uses it just to be a jerk and scare people in his front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Tehomes

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a Ghillie suit and this one is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Myers

customer_reviews.title: Ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: I used this outfit for halloween with a burnt old man mask and scared the heck out of the kids! Once the suit is on its really great. Fit was good quality is really good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: john spevak

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves playing airsoft army with his friends, and now it's even more fun with his ghillie suit. He was so happy to see this came in the mail and it was very fast shipping thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Smallarz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked and felt good. You couldnt see my husband in the woods. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: marjorie wells

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It really is a one size fits most. Arrived on time and packaged well. I love it thanks
customer_reviews.author: WitchMe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on a 5'8 240lb male. Comes assembled with a carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: OMG AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product nicely packaged and the suit was light weight with lots of thread in it! Check out the pictures. I scared my neighbors as soon as it arrived home!
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice on a 5'8 tall guy
customer_reviews.text: It fit me like a glove. I wish there was more layers of yarn though, a couple of spots where the yarn doesnt cover as well. after a couple uses it started too lose some yarn but its ok i just added some leaves from the ground
customer_reviews.author: St.Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hunting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son (15) and he loved it. He is very tall and this suit fit him perfectly. The only complaint is that it does have a few bald spots but he said he can live with it. It was in side out, which it is supposed to be. He cant wait to try it out in the hills. It is great for camouflage! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: vern33

customer_reviews.title: Not for field use but good costume. Strings fall out when pulled gently or ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for field use but good costume. Strings fall out when pulled gently or when you brush up against anything non-smooth
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My nephew wanted this for Christmas, and it ended up being a hit. Everyone was impressed with the quality and look of the suit. Kudos to my nephew for doing his research!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Grille Suit
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I bought this for my grandson and he uses it every time he goes for a game of paint ball. However, he used it on me to scare me! It is of great quality and most important, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: salcea124

customer_reviews.title: For the price it was awesome for my teenage son with his friends and their ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was awesome for my teenage son with his friends and their air soft wars. He had so much fun jumping out of bushes to startle his older sister.
customer_reviews.author: Ana'

customer_reviews.title: grandson happy
customer_reviews.text: my grandson was thrilled with this suit. The only problem I have is the stringy things that fall off...not too many though. I hope it does well in the Dryel cleaning of it.. he uses it for play
customer_reviews.author: ballet2435

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC quality ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC quality ghillie suit! The item came quickly and was better than I could have imagined. My son loves it! (Pic of him testing it out in the front yard the day it came and after a little fluffing)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Really works out well and comes with a nice storage pack for use next year
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it would be as big of a hit as it was. I got many people coming up to me and getting photos together. Really works out well and comes with a nice storage pack for use next year. A lot of people did think I was chubaka (sp?) from Star Wars.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybadger

customer_reviews.title: I liked the Modern Warrior Woodland and Forest Design Ghillie Suit ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Modern Warrior Woodland and Forest Design Ghillie Suit I now have two. One size fits all well. I believe I made a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barnacle Riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was so happy with this very well made suit.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Tum

customer_reviews.title: Great costume! Five boys had the same costume and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! Five boys had the same costume and had a great Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: really looks the part, my son successfully hid in ...
customer_reviews.text: really looks the part, my son successfully hid in the garden and scared his father five times in one day, he stands at 5'7 and lots of room
customer_reviews.author: sara Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong for 40 bucks. It's a one size fits most item. Now I'm about 5'9" and it fits perfectly fine. It has a draw string so that you can adjust it. It has a decent amount of string attached to it, however there are some slightly visible areas. The only downside is that the strings attached seam like they might come off easily. Other than that I'm more than happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Grandson so excited
customer_reviews.text: 13 year old grandson was so excited when he opened this Christmas present. Wish I had a video of his excitement. Three days later killed his first deer.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I got it for airsof games but I also use it as a hollween costume it is easy to put on and take off it is a 3 pice suit keeps me warm and it gives great camo day or night if your on the right spot
customer_reviews.author: a guy

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS VERY WELL
customer_reviews.text: A little big, but it still is bad ass! It really really works. Had friends walk right next to me in an airsoft battle and they didn't even see/notice me!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camouflage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gully suit, I was worrying that it was going to be like the leaf kind (horrible camouflage) but the camouflage was way better then the leaf the only downside that I had is that it gets caught on everything but overall great suit
customer_reviews.author: Tristin G. Shreves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice suit. Light and fits well. The carry bag makes it easy to store and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I got the xl, Im 6' 2" 225lbs fits great. Great for the price, fit nicely over my clothes. Strings need to be combed out with your fingers. Some strings came loose. Very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Zombies, hide.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wayyy cooler than you think. It's awesome! You need this when the Zombies come.
customer_reviews.author: Scoops McFincher

customer_reviews.title: works great for AirSoft wars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son...he LOVES it...works great for AirSoft wars, according to him.
customer_reviews.author: schneidude11

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our teenage son who is into air soft games. He loves wearing it in the woods and hiding from his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional, light weight, effective
customer_reviews.text: Overall this a really good value for the price. Bought this for my 13 year old who has been looking for (requesting) a ghillie suite for years. He's predominantly looking to use it for airsoft wars and paintball but I know he also wants to hide and scare us when we least expect it in and around our property. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joel P MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it and all his friends thought it was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for Halloween. Son loved it and all his friends thought it was the greatest costume
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: good deal / good suit.
customer_reviews.text: Great in cool to cold weather. Quiet to walk around in and fairly well put together. For the price this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kmkuhn

customer_reviews.title: WILL FIT 5'5 and Over TRUST ME.
customer_reviews.text: When i Got it i thought it didnt have the camoflouge strings but its a 3 piece suit Jacket, pants, and hood. they place all 3 inside out inside a bag that reads Modern warrior. It fits me and I am 5'5 it does look stocky and big but its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Madora

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ghillie suit and it is awesome. It blends in perfectly in the bushes. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gillett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to have guest be so scared on Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gift to have guest be so scared on Christmas Eve morning as they each came to the house. Fit great and made with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Very comfortable, it breathes very well and comes with a great storage bag to keep it all together. Very well made.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. My son loves it. Its sturdy. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: jg1701

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son wore for Halloween and he was the scariest !
customer_reviews.author: Saborah

customer_reviews.title: Great for costume use, haven't used for actual concealment?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone who wanted to wear this with their Halloween costume. it fit the bill perfectly. i Havent really stopped to consider using this really in a game of paintball or something? i suppose it will be effective. Its not a long lasting item that is for sure but if treated well could probably be used 10 times or 15? it seems to me that if you were to lay down in the terrain and crawled around the yarn would pull out and get sparser and sparser with each use. again we just use it for part of a Mossman costume and it perfect for that, if not a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of detangling to do. Works great for the purpose I got it. Paintball camo, and camp fun.

customer_reviews.title: really nice guillie
customer_reviews.text: is quite easy to use, comes the pants, shirt with buttons, the head covering is a kind of thinner fabric to see through it and also comes with a smaller piece to camouflage the m4a1

customer_reviews.title: Made my son's Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable and well made. A good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but use with Caution
customer_reviews.text: So my son skateboards with this up and down the street when they're not running around shooting airsoft pistols. Dang near gave our neighbor a heart attack!

customer_reviews.title: He took it to camp and loved it. Good fit on a tall teenager
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He took it to camp and loved it. Good fit on a tall teenager. Quality seems good.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it .
customer_reviews.text: Very good cheap ghillie suit. Loads of fun for the kids. Reasonably well made.

customer_reviews.title: Bushy
customer_reviews.text: My kid bought this as a costume, but wore it several times and it seems to be holding up good.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great hit with my nephew. Good quality and fit, and the camo works well in the midwest woods.

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Money
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat this ghillie suit for the price it is excellent. Once you get it out of the bag and fluff the material it will cover the entire suit. For someone looking for a ghillie suit but doesn't want to spend a lot of money for it then this is the suit for you.

customer_reviews.text: loved it, could use a few more strings on the arms it was a little bald

customer_reviews.text: Ghillie suite Is cheapley made. Went hunting with it one time, it caught every little branch, and sticker briars around. Had to fight to get little branches out of material. I ended up given it to my grandchild for a costume. It does look scarey like Big Foot. I was scared i would of gotten shot by someone thinking I was Big Foot.

customer_reviews.title: For Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because my grandson was so happy to get this. He plays with his friends in our woods. It hides him well. He also used this as his Halloween costume, not to get candy, but for the joy of scaring people. He had so many compliments from ones he scared. They even wanted to take his picture. Once you get it out of the bag it comes in, there is no way to stuff it in again.

customer_reviews.title: He loved his Ghilli suit and wore it every day after ...
customer_reviews.text: He loved his Ghilli suit and wore it every day after school Nd for Halloween. His friend ordered one from you! Thanks for the reasonable delivery time

customer_reviews.text: Asan avid hunter, i love this thing! I literally disappear into the backround. You do have to contend with it snagging on branches etc, but it is still a great suit.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price, not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Quality of construction decent for price. It serves the purpose, nothing special. If you want one that will last just pay more.

customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my teenage son! He loves this thing! You could scare your friends or family by hiding in the shrubs :)

customer_reviews.title: Am very happy only cannot see out very well
customer_reviews.text: Am very happy only cannot see out very well, other than that it is super! The camouflage is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Alder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ghillie Suit - but BIG
customer_reviews.text: Really cool ghillie Suit. My 10 year old loves it, but he is drowning in it a little. It actually fits his father better than it fits him. No worries though. He still loves it and he isn't getting any smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. DeRocher

customer_reviews.title: didnt like it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it, had to break strings to put it on its blotches of strings about every 10 inches, I'll save it for friends who want to go hunting and don't have anything. Went to bass pro and bought real tree with sent lock and paid the same amount I paid here and it was much better
customer_reviews.author: Dave Grammer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it cannot be beat!!!! great quality and holds up to anything!! Only con is that it picks up alot of foliage off the ground and is a pain to remove
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Uster

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for an airsoft sniper
customer_reviews.text: I was able to hide from my opponents easily as oppose to the other ghillie suit I had purchased a few years ago
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lanci

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 12 year old son and it worked out very well. The wait is adjustable. Great for Halloween costume. Got a lot of comments about it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Harrison

product_meta.title: Modern Warrior Mixed Tactical and Hunting Ghillie Suit
product_meta.description: Hunting, Shooting, Fishing, Bird Watching, This is the Suit to Blend into the Countryside Background. Top Quality - Low price. Chest- 44"-52", Waist- Up to 44", Inseam- 30", Sleeve length: 35". By Modern Warrior
feature_bullets: Adjustable Elastic Band to Fit Sizes M-XXL
